item.description:
Look for the French flag!!
otre hôte amical, Bob Yeager, a offert de nouveau sa maison français-inspiré merveilleuse pour notre réunion ! Venir et célébrer notre Meetup 100 ! Vos offrandes de brunch seront les plus appréciées.
Vous pouvez jouer de petanque aussi. C'est une maison et jardin extraordinaire.Venez nombereux!
RSVP ici,SVP. Robert's ordinateur is broken, so he has no email.

Our friendly host, Bob Yeager, has once again offered his wonderful French-inspired home for our réunion! Come and celebrate our 100th Meetup!Play petanque if you wish.
Your brunch offerings will be very appreciated, so please bring something to share. If you have never been to his house before, you are in for a treat! The house and gardens are extraordinary.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Brunch at Bob's house Café Robert!
